## IExtension interface

A Theatre.js Studio extension. You can define one either in a separate package, or within your project.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IExtension 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [globalToolbar?](./studio.iextension.globaltoolbar.md) | { component: React.ComponentType&lt;{}&gt;; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Set this if you'd like to add a component to the global toolbar (on the top) |
|  [id](./studio.iextension.id.md) | string | Pick a unique ID for your extension. Ideally the name would be unique if the extension was to be published to the npm repository. |
|  [panes?](./studio.iextension.panes.md) | Array&lt;[PaneClassDefinition](./studio.paneclassdefinition.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Introduces new pane types. |
